explanation: Salutation, Body, Closing, and Signature are all standard parts of a traditional written letter. A Hashtag is a metadata tag used primarily on social media platforms.

The Declaration of Independence, Articles of Confederation, Constitution, and Bill of Rights are all documents from the late 18th century that established the United States as an independent nation and laid out its initial governmental structure and citizens' rights. The Emancipation Proclamation was issued during the Civil War in 1863, nearly a century later, and served a different, though critical, purpose.
Meter, Kilogram, Second, and Ampere are all SI Base Units, representing length, mass, time, and electric current, respectively. Watt is an SI Derived Unit, used for power.
